text: Mohamad Ali Keshavarz (, April 15, 1930 - June 14, 2020) was an Iranian movie and theater actor. He was born in Isfahan, Iran. He was known for his role in the television series Hezar Dastan. He also appeared in movies such as Shabe Quzi, Mr. Naive, and in Del Shodegan. Keshavarz died from a lung infection on June 14, 2020 in Tehran, aged 90.Actor Mohamad Ali Keshavarz passes away at 90 ==References== ==Other websites== * * Naghsh Ä€farin-i az Esfahan (A Character Actor from Esfahan), in Persian, Jadid Online, 27 January 2009, .
